mapper.sql: a.id, a.jy_id, a.patient_name, a.patient_sex, a.patient_age, a.card_id, a.bar_code, a.apply_doctor, a.apply_department, a.test_doctor, a.test_department, a.patient_type, a.group_by, a.receive_date, a.test_date, a.specimen_type, a.state, a.combination_name, a.combination_code, a.test_item_name, a.test_item_code, a.test_item_cost, a.accept_status, a.create_by, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.update_time, a.sys_org_code, a.depart_id, a.depart_parent_id, a.remarks, a.package_id, a.instr_code, a.instr_name
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT , b.update_time as "inspectionTime", d.count as "count" from ex_inspection_inf b left join ex_inspection_items a on a.jy_id=b.jy_id and b.code=a.test_item_code left join pd_use_package c on a.test_item_code=c.code and b.code=c.code and c.del_flag='0' left join pd_use_package_detail d on c.id=d.package_id and d.del_flag='0' where 1=1
AND b.ref_bar_code = #{entity.refBarCode}
AND a.patient_name LIKE concat('%',#{entity.patientName},'%')
AND a.card_id LIKE concat('%',#{entity.cardId},'%')
AND a.bar_code LIKE concat('%',#{entity.barCode},'%')
AND a.instr_code=#{entity.instrCode}
order by b.create_time desc
SELECT jy_id as "jyId" FROM ex_inspection_items a
